content:
Each thoughtfully designed room and suite comes with a wide array of amenities and services that allow you to take full advantage of our location.

  • Oceanfront balcony with seating
  • Daily shuttle to downtown Key West
  • Luxury furnishings
  • Premium bedding by Conoisseur, towels by Grand Royal
  • High-speed Wi-Fi
  • Flat-screen TV
  • Custom Key West Collection bath products
  • Plush bathrobes by Boca Terry
